description: This file defines an Angular component named 'BoardComponent' for a Tic-Tac-Toe game. It manages a 3x3 game board, handling user clicks on individual cells and providing input properties for cell states and disabled status.

classes.name: BoardComponent
classes.description: An Angular component representing the game board for Tic-Tac-Toe, allowing interaction with the cells and emitting events upon user clicks.

methods.name: onCell
methods.description: Handles cell clicks; if not disabled, emits the index of the clicked cell.

methods.name: trackByIndex
methods.description: Provides a track-by function for Angular's ngFor to optimize rendering by tracking items by their index.
